title: FIFA 22 News | Latest News
body_text:
About our EA Sports FC news

Stay tuned to our NewsNow feed on EA Sports FC for comprehensive coverage of this significant shift in football gaming. Whether you're a lifelong FIFA fan or new to the world of virtual football, our feed is your essential guide to EA Sports FC.
